attributes.action: United Kingdom to leave the EU with immeditate effect
attributes.additional_details:
The people that have signed this e-petition formally request that the United Kingdom secedes its membership of the European Union for the following Reasons:
Due to economic circumstances the people of Britain can no longer afford to contribute to such an organisation.
The people of Britain at no time gave their consent to a Federal European Union, only an economic trade agreement.
The people of Britain at no time gave their consent to open border Mass immigration from Eastern Europe.
The people of Britain at no time gave their consent to the transfer of key decision making powers and legislation from our democratically Elected Government to a collection of foreign powers not directly elected by the British people.
